results.name: Denominators of coefficients of expansion of arctan(x)^2 = x^2-2/3*x^4+23/45*x^6-44/105*x^8+563/1575*x^10-3254/10395*x^12+ ...
mathematica: a[n_] := (-1)^(n+1)*Sum[1/(n*(2*k-1)), {k, 1, n}] // Denominator; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 19}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 04 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 17 2002
